categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Noros was a male Human who was a lieutenant in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic, when he was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock.
Lieutenant Noros appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Tatooine Modification Commendations vendor on Vaiken Spacedock.
